{"type":"text","timestamp":1771657219908,"sessionID":"ses_381009655ffenadldaGqGr8fYE","part":{"id":"prt_c7effb6c8001bEGysb1Oiqgdyl","sessionID":"ses_381009655ffenadldaGqGr8fYE","messageID":"msg_c7eff69ec001NPjGGWkVKozOLc","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# syntax=docker/dockerfile:1.4
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependency manifests first
COPY requirements.txt .
COPY download_model.py .

# Install runtime dependencies and download model
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt && \
    python download_model.py && \
    rm download_model.py

# Copy source code
COPY . .

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && \
    adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

# Production stage
FROM python:3.11-slim

WORKDIR /app

# Copy runtime dependencies and model from builder
COPY --from=builder /app/requirements.txt ./
COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt ./

# Copy application code
COPY --from=builder /app/app.py ./
COPY --from=builder /app/requirements.txt ./

# Install runtime dependencies only
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && \
    adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser
USER appuser

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com" \
      org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service"

CMD ["uvicorn", "app:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```
